      • compareToMinutes

        private int compareToMinutes(java.util.Calendar date,
                   java.util.GregorianCalendar gregorianCalendar)
        Utility to compare two dates with respect to minutes
        Parameters:
        date - passed calendar object representing data of alarm
        gregorianCalendar - current date
        Returns:
        -1 if date is smaller than gregorianCalendar with respect to minutes, 0 if equal, 1 otherwise

      • playSound

        private void playSound(Context context,
             Uri alert,
             double volume,
             java.lang.Boolean alarm)
        Plays sound calling Media Player API
        Parameters:
        context - context to make Media Player happy
        alert - URI to alarm
        volume - volume from 0 to 100
        alarm - if true than starting playing, finishing playing otherwise
